New Records: Pete Alonso hit a 3-run home run in the ninth inning, breaking the game open for the Mets
Key Match Events: The Mets staged a comeback in the ninth inning after being quiet for eight innings
Pete Alonso's 3-run home run was the turning point of the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets advanced to the NL Division Series with the win
Carlos Mendoza's decisions in relief were crucial to the victory
The Brewers' strong pitching performance was highlighted by Tobias Myers' five scoreless innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game's outcome led to the Empire State Building being lit in blue and orange
The Polish Sausage won the Sausage Race during the game
